mapper.select: select count(*) as count from public.mmb_level_rule mlr where mlr.deleted = '0'
select mlr.* from public.mmb_level_rule mlr where mlr.deleted = '0' where mlr.point_single <= #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by mlr.point_single desc limit 1
select mlr.* from public.mmb_level_rule mlr where mlr.deleted = '0' and mlr.point_lower <= #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (mlr.point_upper >= #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER} or mlr.point_upper is null)

select count(*) from view_approval_up_member member inner join (select member_id, max(approval_level_id) max_approval_level_id from view_approval_up_member group by member_id) ma on ma.member_id = member.member_id and member.approval_level_id = ma.max_approval_level_id where member.approval_level_id > member.current_level_id
AND member.current_level_id = #{currentLevelId}

select a.member_id, (case when max(a.a_total) is not null then max(a.a_total) else 0 end) as max_amout, ( case when sum(a.a_total) is not null then sum(a.a_total) else 0 end ) as total_amount
from( select m.member_id,om.pay_infact as a_total,to_char((SELECT om.pay_time::timestamp),'yyyy') as y_time from public.mmb_master m left join public.ord_master om on om.member_id = m.member_id and to_char((SELECT om.pay_time::timestamp),'yyyy')=to_char((SELECT now()::timestamp),'yyyy') and om.pay_status='20' and om.deleted = '0' where m.member_level_id='30' and m.deleted = '0' and (m.telephone is not null or trim(m.telephone) != '')
UNION ALL
select m.member_id,eos.amount as a_total,to_char((SELECT eos.order_time::timestamp),'yyyy') as y_time from mmb_master m left join erp_order_statistics eos on eos.member_code::text = m.telephone::text and to_char((SELECT eos.order_time::timestamp),'yyyy')=to_char((SELECT now()::timestamp),'yyyy') and eos.deleted = '0' where m.member_level_id='30' and m.deleted = '0' and (m.telephone is not null or trim(m.telephone) != '')
)a group by a.member_id having ((case when sum(a.a_total) is not null then sum(a.a_total) else 0 end) < '3000' and (case when max(a.a_total) is not null then max(a.a_total) else 0 end) < '1500')

select a.member_id, (case when max(a.a_total) is not null then max(a.a_total) else 0 end) as max_amout, ( case when sum(a.a_total) is not null then sum(a.a_total) else 0 end ) as total_amount
from( select m.member_id,om.pay_infact as a_total,to_char((SELECT om.pay_time::timestamp),'yyyy') as y_time from public.mmb_master m left join public.ord_master om on om.member_id = m.member_id and (to_char((SELECT om.pay_time::timestamp),'yyyy')=to_char((SELECT (now()- interval '1 years')::timestamp),'yyyy') OR to_char((SELECT om.pay_time::timestamp),'yyyy')=to_char((SELECT now()::timestamp),'yyyy')) and om.pay_status='20' and om.deleted = '0' where m.member_level_id='30' and m.deleted = '0' and (m.telephone is not null or trim(m.telephone) != '')
UNION ALL
select m.member_id,eos.amount as a_total,to_char((SELECT eos.order_time::timestamp),'yyyy') as y_time from mmb_master m left join erp_order_statistics eos on eos.member_code::text = m.telephone::text and (to_char((SELECT eos.order_time::timestamp),'yyyy')=to_char((SELECT (now()- interval '1 years')::timestamp),'yyyy') OR to_char((SELECT eos.order_time::timestamp),'yyyy')=to_char((SELECT now()::timestamp),'yyyy')) and eos.deleted = '0' where m.member_level_id='30' and m.deleted = '0' and (m.telephone is not null or trim(m.telephone) != '') )a group by a.member_id having ((case when sum(a.a_total) is not null then sum(a.a_total) else 0 end)<'3000' and (case when max(a.a_total) is not null then max(a.a_total) else 0 end)<'1500');
